channel.title: GitHub trends
channel.description: Automatically compiled list of trending GitHub repositories

item.title: JimmyLv/awesome-nano-banana
item.description: Awesome curated collection of images and prompts generated by gemini-2.5-flash-image (aka Nano Banana) state-of-the-art image generation and editing model. Explore AI generated visuals created with Gemini, showcasing Google’s advanced image generation capabilities.

item.title: meituan-longcat/LongCat-Flash-Chat
item.description: (no description)

item.title: 0x23/MicroManipulatorStepper
item.description: A sub-micrometer 3D motion control plattform.

item.title: adrianjagielak/home-assistant-futurehome
item.description: Futurehome add-on for Home Assistant. Designed to be a complete drop-in replacement for the official Futurehome app, with support for all device types compatible with the Futurehome hub. See the FAQ for more details.

item.title: vllm-project/semantic-router
item.description: Intelligent Mixture-of-Models Router for Efficient LLM Inference

item.title: run-llama/semtools
item.description: Semantic search and document parsing tools for the command line

item.title: High-Logic/Genie
item.description: GPT-SoVITS ONNX Inference Engine & Model Converter

item.title: rasbt/reasoning-from-scratch
item.description: Implement a reasoning LLM in PyTorch from scratch, step by step

item.title: google-deepmind/limit
item.description: On the Theoretical Limitations of Embedding-Based Retrieval

item.title: QuentinFuxa/WhisperLiveKit
item.description: Real-time & local speech-to-text, translation, and speaker diarization. With server & web UI.

item.title: trueadm/ripple
item.description: the elegant UI framework for the web

item.title: control-theory/gonzo
item.description: Gonzo! The Go based TUI log analysis tool

item.title: elixir-lang/expert
item.description: Official Elixir Language Server Protocol implementation

item.title: dinoki-ai/osaurus
item.description: Native, Apple Silicon–only local LLM server. Similar to Ollama, but built on Apple's MLX for maximum performance on M‑series chips. SwiftUI app + SwiftNIO server with OpenAI‑compatible endpoints.

item.title: MaliosDark/wifi-3d-fusion
item.description: WiFi-3D-Fusion is an open-source research project that leverages WiFi CSI signals and deep learning to estimate 3D human pose, fusing wireless sensing with computer vision techniques for next-generation spatial awareness.

item.description: (no description)

item.title: renzorlive/vimmaster
item.description: VIM Master: in-browser game that teaches core Vim motions and editing commands through short, focused levels. No installs required—just open `index.html` and start practicing.

item.title: kane50613/takumi
item.description: Render your React components to images. Available for Rust, Node.js, and WebAssembly.
